metadata.title: CVE-2021-4216 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A Floating point exception (division-by-zero) flaw was found in Mupdf forzero width pages in muraster.c. It is fixed in Mupdf-1.20.0-rc1 upstream.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
